name: 許丁友
objective: 本課程旨在針對訊號處理與系統識別相關理論與方法進行專題研討,其內容包含結構動力之基本觀念、處理數位訊號之基本技巧、系統識別之理論與應用等
schedule:
1.　　Introduction
2.　　Signal Process
3.　　Signal Process
4.　　Signal Process
5.　　Structural Dynamics
6.　　Structural Dynamics
7.　　Eigenvalue Realization Algorithm
8.　　Eigenvalue Realization Algorithm
9.　　Eigenvalue Realization Algorithm
10.　　Mid-Exam
11.　　System Realization Using Information Matrix
12.　　Hilbert-Huang Transform
13.　　Autoregression
14.　　Frequency Domain Decomposition
15.　　Damage Detection
16.　　Practical Issues
17.　　Presentations
18.　　Final-Exam
scorePolicy: 作業20%、期中考25%、專題報告20%、期末考35%
materials:
1. Dynamics of Structures, Ray W. Clough & Joseph Penzien, New York : McGraw-Hill, c1993, 2nd ed
2. Applied System Identification, Jer-Nan Juang, Englewood Cliffs, N.J. : Prentice Hall, c1994
